titleStmt.title: Estes Davis to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG8033

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Cincinnati O July 9. 1863
Secretary of Executive Dptmt
Frankfort Ky.

Dr Sir As much inconvenience is frequently experienced here for want of some one always -- ready to take Acknowledgmt of Deeds & legalalese other matters regarding -- property and transactions for or coming -- under the Jurisdiction of Kentucky I have concluded to Make application to the Governor of Kentuckey through the Executive department to be appointed "Commissioner of Deeds &c." at Cincinnati for the State of Kentucky. If you will kindly forwd me the necessary Blanks, and instructions in full including (Expence) & what recommendation will be necessary --

You will much oblige your obt svt
Estes Davis
Notary Public
Hamilton Co O
